title: THE MANY-ANYON PROBLEM
abstract: Lectures presented at the VI Mexican School of Particles and Fields, Villahermosa, 3-7 October, 1994. Contents: 1. Introduction 2. The Symmetry Group Approach to the Quantum Mechanics of Identical Particles 3. How Come Anyons? 4. The Transmutation of Statistics into a Topological Interaction 5. The Chern-Simons Action and Anyon Statistics 6. Nonrelativistic Chern-Simons-(Maxwell) Field Theory 7. Epilogue
